metadata.synopsis: This is Danis' default dialogue if Bex is either occupied or dead, so it's a bit uneasy and tonally ambiguous without giving a strong indication of what's on his mind.

0.speaker: Danis
0.text: I don't want to wait around here longer than we have to.

1.speaker: Danis
1.text: We're leaving soon - whenever Zevlor gives word.
